_header: Saint Alphege the martyr that good man was enough
Subjects: Alphege, saint, life of; saints’ lives
_description: Life of St. Alphege in the South English Legendary — couplets

BodAsh43.First Lines:
SEyn Alfe þe martir þat good mon was InouȝIbore was
                    in engelond & to holi lif drouȝ…
BodAsh43.Last Lines:
…Nou bidde we seynt Alfe þat broȝte þer is lif to
                    endeþat we mote þoru is bone to þe Ioie of heuene
                    wende

Bod779.First Lines:
Seint alphe þe marter þat good man was InouȝI bore
                    he was in ingelond & to holy lyf drouȝ…
Bod779.Last Lines:
…Of oure mysdedes for ȝeuenesse & þin wille
                    fulfille& bryng vs to þyn ryche blisse & scheld vs fram
                    þyne ille

BodEngPoeta1.First Lines:
SEint Alphe þe Martir good mon was i nouhI boren he was in
                    Engelond and to holy lyf drouh…
BodEngPoeta1.Last Lines:
…Now bidde we seint Alphe þat þus brouhte his lyf to
                    endeÞat we mowe þorwh his preyere in to heuene wende.
                    Amen.
BodEngPoeta1.Facsimiles:
Doyle,  I. A.,
                        ed.  
             The Vernon Manuscript. A Facsimile of Bodleian Library, Oxford, MS Eng.
                poet.a.1,
          with an introduction by A. I. Doyle. Cambridge: D. S. Brewer, 1987. 
Scase,  Wendy,  and  Nick Kennedy, eds.  
             A facsimile edition of the Vernon manuscript: Oxford, Bodleian Library, MS. Eng. Poet. A. 1.
         Oxford: The Bodleian Library, 2011.

BodEngPoete94.First Lines:
Seint alphe þe marter þat goodman was inowBore he was in
                    englond & to holi lif drow…
BodEngPoete94.Last Lines:
…His broþer was maister of his ost edrich was his nameHe
                    het his broþer edrich to canterberi fare…

BodLauMis463.First Lines:
SEint Alphe þe martir þat gode man was y nowI bore he was
                    in engelond & to eche godnes drow…
BodLauMis463.Last Lines:
…Now bidde we to went Alphei þat þus brought his lif to
                    endþat we mowe thorwe his bone to þe Ioye of heuene
                    wend
BodLauMis463.Note: Two columns per page, one full-line, the other half-line.

BodTan17.First Lines:
SEint alphege þe marter þat good man was I noughBore he
                    was in ingelond and to holi liif drough…
BodTan17.Last Lines:
…Bidde we alle to seint alphege þat his liif þus
                    brouȝte to endeÞat we mote þour his lore to þe ioye of
                    heuen wende

OxfTri57.First Lines:
Seint Alphe þe martir þat guod man was y nouȝI bore
                    he was in Engelond þat holy lyf drouȝ…
OxfTri57.Last Lines:
…Now bidde we oure lord & seint alphe þat þus
                    broȝte his lyf to endeÞat we mote þorgh his bone to þe
                    ioye of heuene wende
OxfTri57.Attributed Title:
vita sancti Alphegi martiris (f. 30, to right, rubric, by scribe);
                        Alphegus (RT)

CamCCC145.First Lines:
Seinte Alphege þe martir þat godman was InouIbore he was
                    in engelonde and to holi lif drou…
CamCCC145.Last Lines:
…Nou bidde we oure louerd seint alphe þat þus broȝte
                    is lyf to endeÞat we mote þoru is loue to þe Ioie of heuene
                    wende
CamCCC145.Editions:
D’Evelyn,  Charlotte,  and  A. J. Mill, eds.  
             The South English Legendary: Corpus Christi College Cambridge MS. 145
                and British Museum MS. Harley 2277, with variants from Bodley MS. Ashmole 43 and
                British Museum MS. Cotton Julius D.ix.
EETS

CamKC13.First Lines:
SEint alphe þe martir þat good man was y nowI bore he was
                    In Engelond and to holy chirch lyf he drow…
CamKC13.Last Lines:
…Now bidde we good and seint Alphe þat þus brouȝ his
                    lif to endeÞat we mote þoru his bone to þe blisse of heuene
                    wende

CamMagPep2344.First Lines:
Seint Alphe þe Martyr þat goed man was ynowIbore he was
                    in Engelonde and to holy lif he drow…
CamMagPep2344.Last Lines:
…Now bydde we god and Seint Alphe þat þus brouYte his lif
                    to endeÞat we mote þorw his bone to þe blisse of heuene
                    hennes wende

CamTCC605.First Lines:
SEint alphe þe marter þat goud man was ynowebore he was
                    in englond & to holy lif drowe…
CamTCC605.Last Lines:
…bydde we seint alphe þat broȝt his lyf þus to
                    endeþat we mot þorwe his bone in to heuene wende

BLAdd10301.First Lines:
SEint alfege þe martir þat gode man was ynouI bore he was
                    in engelonde & to holy lif drou…
BLAdd10301.Last Lines:
…Nou bidde we oure lord seint alfe þat þus broȝt ys
                    lif to endeþat we mote þoru is bone to þe Ioye of heuene
                    wende
BLAdd10301.Attributed Title:
De sancto alphego (f. 67, by scribe in margin beside first line);

BLCottJulDIX.First Lines: SEint alfe þe martir þat godman was inouIbore was in englond & to holi lif drou…
BLCottJulDIX.Last Lines: …nou bidde we our lord seint alfe þat brouȝte þus his lif to endeþat we mote þorou his bone to þe ioie of heuen wende
BLCottJulDIX.Note: “Capitulum xxxi” added to right margin by later hand (f. 60).

BLHar2277.First Lines: Sent Alphe þe martir þat god man was youȝIbore was in England & to holi lye drouȝ…
BLHar2277.Last Lines: …Nou bidde we oure louerd seint Alphen þat þus brouȝte his laf to endeþat we mote þurf his bone to þe ioye of helene wende
